name: Sehnrhyx Syliri
greeting: Welcome, Zukarrii. Your Journey begins in Zurath.

whisper_child_1_1.text: Speak with me to embrace your destiny in Zurath.
whisper_child_1_1.onComplete: Well done. Now seek the Vestment of Zukarath in the depths.

whisper_child_2_4.text: Return with the Vestment to prove your worth.
whisper_child_2_4.onComplete: You have earned the Vestment. Speak to me about the Sigil.

whisper_child_3_1.text: The Sigil of Zukarath awaits you. Seek it on Tier 6.
whisper_child_3_1.onComplete: The path is clear. Defeat the guardian.

whisper_child_3_5.text: You bear the Sigil. What did you find in the depths?
whisper_child_3_5.onComplete: The corruption grows. We must act.

whisper_child_4_1.text: Are you ready to face the corruption on Tier 7?
whisper_child_4_1.onComplete: Go now, and gather the Ashen Shards.

whisper_child_4_4.text: Do you have the Ashen Shards?
whisper_child_4_4.onComplete: The shards will aid us. Seek more.

whisper_child_5_4.text: The Rings of the Magi are yours. What power do they hold?

whisper_child_7_1.text: Ashangal’s corruption is strong. Teleport to Tier 11?

whisper_child_7_4.text: The Ashen Shards are vital. Do you have them?
whisper_child_7_4.onComplete: Well done. Now the Shard of Echoes.

whisper_child_7_5.text: What is this Shard of Echoes?
whisper_child_7_5.onComplete: This shard speaks of Echoes. Seek them out.

whisper_child_8_2.text: What have you learned from the Echoes?
whisper_child_8_2.onComplete: The Echoes guide us. Continue your path.

whisper_child_9_3.text: Your magic gear is impressive. Are you ready?
whisper_child_9_3.onComplete: Choose your reward: Blade or Staff.
